avalancheActivity.highlights: The old snow is generally considered stable after thaw. Little new snow is in the area.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow subsided and melted in thaw. The remaining snow is mostly considered homogeneous and stable. A little new snow was added in mountains on Sunday.

travelAdvisory.comment: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Older snow is generally considered stable.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Older snow is generally considered stable.

weatherForecast.highlights: Lítilsháttar éljagangur á þriðjudag og miðvikudag. Bætir í úrkomu og vind seinnipart miðvikudags fram á fimmtudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow after N-NE snow showers, thinn slabs may be expected in southerly aspects. Older snow is mostly homogeneous and stable after thaw.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow after N-NE snow showers on Sunday and Monday. Unstable tthinn wind slabs may be expected in southerly aspects. Older snow is homogeneous and grainy.

travelAdvisory.comment: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Older snow is generally considered stable.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Older snow is generally considered stable.

avalancheActivity.highlights: It has snowed on top of the old hard packed snow and wind slabs could be present.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It snowed on Monday during NE-erly wind, which could have formed wind slabs on SW-erly aspects. Turns to SW wind on Tuesday with possible blowing snow.

travelAdvisory.comment: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Older snow is generally considered stable.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Older snow is generally considered stable.

weatherForecast.highlights: Norðaustlæg átt með snjókomu aðfaranótt þriðjudags. Snýst í suðlæga átt á þriðjudag. Áframhaldandi suðlæg átt og líkur á éljum næstu daga.

avalancheActivity.comment: Multiple thin avalanches released in Seldalur and Fannardalur in Norðfjörður on Saturday morning, 22.2. They all started at high elevations on steep slopes. They released in various aspects.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow high in mountains may be unstable at first, and in the first sunshine. Older snow is mostly considered homogenous and stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: There is little snow left in the lower parts of slopes. It snowed at high elevations over the weekend and the new snow can be unstable at first. The old snow is considered homogenous and stable.

travelAdvisory.comment: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Older snow is generally considered stable.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Older snow is generally considered stable.

weatherForecast.highlights: Vestlægar eða breytilegar áttir næstu daga og líkur á dálítilli ofankomu. Hiti um og yfir frostmarki við sjávarmál en frost til fjalla.
